Question.Subject: Why isn't the dulce cosmetics site working?
Question.Content:
I just saw the makeup on juicystars07's youtube and I want it sooo bad! I get to where it says proceed with payment and I click it and it says "secure connection failed" or something. Help?
I have firefox. this is exactly what it is.
Secure Connection Failed
An error occurred during a connection to www.dulcecosmetics.com.
SSL received a record that exceeded the maximum permissible length.
(Error code: ssl_error_rx_record_too_long)
* The page you are trying to view can not be shown because the authenticity of the received data could not be verified.
* Please contact the web site owners to inform them of this problem. Alternatively, use the command found in the help menu to report this broken site.
Question.ChosenAnswer: The site is under maintenance. The site probably wasn't equipped to handle all of the traffic. I want to buy stuff from there too! Love Juicystar07! Just be patient, hopefully it'll be up soon!

Answer.Content: The "or something" makes your question hard to answer. You need to be specific when asking a question in order to get an accurate answer
The site is under maintenance. The site probably wasn't equipped to handle all of the traffic. I want to buy stuff from there too! Love Juicystar07! Just be patient, hopefully it'll be up soon!
